snippet.title: Project Madras - OpenWorld Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Project Madras - semi linear open world Indie game setup in Chennai aka Madras.

PROJECT MADRAS offers a gameplay experience steeped in the rich cultural tapestry of Chennai. Set in the capital city of the TamilNadu where the world's oldest language "TAMIL" thrives, the game brings you a unique cultural journey spanning centuries.

Roam freely through the city's landmarks and neighborhoods, all while pursuing a story that adds purpose to your exploration. PROJECT MADRAS invites you to not just play a game but to be a part of a dynamic culture of Chennai.

PROJECT MADRAS is not just a game, it's a celebration of Chennai's culture, language, and spirit. Join us on this unforgettable journey through the heart of the city!

This is a work in progress Gameplay showcase.
This does not represent the final quality.

Project Madras is an ambitious project that we've been working on for the past few months. We hope you'll join us on this journey and support us as we work to create the best Indian indie game possible!

0:00 - Introduction
1:11 - Beach environment
4:44 - City Environment

Wishlist on steam now and receive updates on playtesting
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2864600/Project_Madras/
Follow us on insta : https://www.instagram.com/projectmadras
Follow us on twitter : https://mobile.twitter.com/ProjectMadras
Join the discord server : https://discord.gg/6qBNwDrnj5
www.projectmadras.com
